heroIntro: Welcome to an exceptional opportunity to acquire a prestigious 3-bedroom apartment in the heart of Calpe's exclusive Centro district. This sophisticated property offers commanding sea views and represents a compelling investment in one of the Costa Blanca's most desirable locations. Priced at €890,000, this apartment is competitively positioned at Calpe's average price point, offering remarkable value for discerning buyers seeking both lifestyle quality and investment potential. The property's central location provides seamless access to Calpe's finest beaches, world-class amenities, and the vibrant Mediterranean lifestyle that attracts affluent residents from across Europe. With the Costa Blanca experiencing consistent 7% year-on-year growth, this acquisition positions you within a strengthening real estate market. The area's blend of cultural sophistication, natural beauty, and modern infrastructure makes this an ideal choice for those seeking to establish a premium European residence or diversify their investment portfolio.
areaSection: Calpe is a stunning coastal municipality on the northern Costa Blanca, distinguished by its iconic Peñón de Ifach limestone rock formation that towers majestically 332 meters above the Mediterranean. This picturesque setting defines one of Spain's most geographically dramatic coastal towns. The region enjoys 320 days of sunshine annually, with mild winters and warm summers moderated by sea breezes. Calpe's position between two pristine bays creates exceptional microclimates and some of the Costa Blanca's most beautiful beaches. The town has evolved into a sophisticated destination that maintains authentic Spanish character whilst accommodating an international community of affluent residents. Its blend of natural beauty, cultural heritage, and modern development creates a unique Mediterranean appeal that transcends typical beach resort tourism.
lifestyleSection: Living in Calpe means embracing a refined Mediterranean lifestyle where cosmopolitan convenience meets authentic Spanish culture. The town hosts a strong expatriate community, particularly British and German residents, ensuring English is widely spoken in commercial establishments and professional services. Daily life revolves around exceptional beaches, world-class dining, and cultural pursuits. The bustling Wednesday market in Calpe offers fresh local produce and artisan goods, whilst established supermarkets like Mercadona and Consum provide international selections. Dining ranges from traditional Spanish restaurants serving paella and seafood to contemporary establishments with international menus. The expat-friendly environment means excellent English-speaking healthcare, reputable private clinics, and professional services. Calpe's vibrant social calendar includes cultural events, sports activities, and social clubs catering to the international community. For leisure, residents enjoy regular golf outings at nearby Club de Golf Ifach, beach clubs, and water sports. The upcoming TRAM connection will further enhance accessibility to neighbouring towns.
investmentSection: This property presents a sophisticated investment opportunity within a demonstrably appreciating market. The Costa Blanca real estate sector has sustained 7% year-on-year growth, positioning Calpe among the region's strongest performers. At €890,000, this apartment offers competitive value relative to comparative properties in Jávea, which command approximately 20% premiums. Rental income potential is substantial—comparable 3-bedroom apartments in central Calpe achieve €1,000 per week during peak seasons, translating to annual rental yields of 5-7% for disciplined management. The property's central location and sea views enhance rental appeal to international tourists and seasonal residents. Market fundamentals remain robust: the region's established expatriate infrastructure, superior lifestyle amenities, and limited supply of premium properties within Calpe's historic centre support continued appreciation. This acquisition combines personal lifestyle benefits with prudent capital deployment.
conclusion: This exceptional 3-bedroom apartment represents a rare convergence of lifestyle quality and investment merit. Positioned in Calpe's prestigious Centro district with commanding sea views, competitively priced at €890,000, the property offers sophisticated Mediterranean living for discerning international buyers. The town's established expatriate infrastructure, world-class amenities, and demonstrable 7% annual appreciation position this acquisition within a strengthening market. Whether seeking a premium European residence, family retreat, or investment property generating €1,000+ weekly rental income, this opportunity addresses multiple objectives. The property's central location, beach proximity, golf access, and international services create an unparalleled lifestyle proposition. Secure your place within Calpe's most prestigious community. Contact us via WhatsApp for viewing arrangements, detailed property information, and investment strategy discussion. Our bilingual team ensures seamless transaction support throughout your acquisition journey.

lifeAndAmenities.intro: Calpe offers comprehensive modern amenities that exceed typical coastal resort standards. Residents enjoy sophisticated healthcare facilities, internationally recognised educational institutions, premium shopping and dining, and excellent transportation infrastructure. The expatriate-friendly environment ensures services and professionals operate with English fluency.

healthcare.text: Healthcare access in Calpe meets premium international standards. Centro de Salud Calp provides primary care services with English-speaking staff, whilst private clinics throughout the town offer specialist services and English-language consultations. Hospital de Dénia, located 30 minutes south, serves as the regional medical centre with modern facilities and comprehensive departments. Many practitioners have trained in the United Kingdom or Northern Europe and maintain familiarity with international medical standards. Emergency services are well-coordinated, and medical tourism options mean specialists from across Spain are readily accessible.

education.text: Calpe and surrounding areas offer excellent educational options for international families. Lady Elizabeth School in nearby Cumbre del Sol (10 minutes) provides British curriculum education to international standards. Laude Newton College, situated 35 minutes away, offers comprehensive schooling with English instruction. Many international families choose Calpe specifically for proximity to these institutions combined with the sophisticated expatriate community. The region's educational infrastructure supports families relocating permanently to the Costa Blanca.

shopping.text: Calpe provides extensive shopping options combining international brands with local Spanish products. Mercadona, Consum, Lidl, and Mas y Mas supermarkets stock international products alongside Spanish specialties. The Wednesday market is legendary among residents for fresh produce, artisan goods, and authentic Spanish shopping experience. Centro shopping district offers boutique retailers, contemporary fashion outlets, and specialist services. International residents appreciate the availability of British products and imported goods throughout the town.

transport.text: Calpe benefits from excellent regional transportation infrastructure. Alicante-Elche Airport, Spain's third-busiest airport with 50+ million passengers annually, is situated 55 kilometers south, offering direct flights to major European cities. Regular bus services connect Calpe to Benidorm, Valencia, and throughout the region. The upcoming TRAM system will revolutionise local transport, connecting Calpe directly to neighbouring municipalities. For driving, the AP-7 motorway provides rapid access to Barcelona (north) and Málaga (south). Most residents maintain vehicles; Calpe offers abundant parking and driving is straightforward given the area's modern infrastructure.

Most beaches are within 800 meters to 2 kilometers of this central property.
